</absSequence>

description:
Shoots an arrow with a trail. Stops when it hits
an event or tile
name: Ranged Attack With Trail
note:
<absSettings>
collider: box, 12, 36
collides: Default
through: 3
</absSettings>
<absSequence>
user lock
user pose atk
user jump backward 48
wait 15
picture sentryShotSmall%[4-5] true 4
trail end0 true 4
move forward 480 30
wait 30
</absSequence>
<absOnDamage>
target cancel
target move towards 200
</absOnDamage>

description:

an event or tile. Move to arrow position at end.
